#summary A guide to installing phpmydiff.

= Requirements =

  * PHP v5+
  * PDO/MYSQLi extension


= Install =

  # Download the latest version of phpmydiff from the Downloads page.
  # Unzip the project to your www directory
  # Make the cache folder writable by the web server
  # Check out application/config/mydiff.ini for any settings you might wish to change
  # Browse to the project in your browser to get started
